description: This file implements the Repository class, which acts as an abstraction layer over a DataSource, providing methods to initialize and perform CRUD operations on vehicles, groups, and events within a fleet management system.

classes.name: Repository
classes.description: A class that wraps a DataSource implementation, providing an interface for data operations related to vehicles, groups, and events, decoupling the data source from the UI layer.

methods.name: getVehicles
methods.description: Retrieves a list of Vehicle objects from the data source.

methods.name: createVehicle
methods.description: Creates a new Vehicle entry in the data source.

methods.name: updateVehicle
methods.description: Updates an existing Vehicle in the data source.

methods.name: deleteVehicle
methods.description: Deletes a Vehicle from the data source by ID.

methods.name: getGroups
methods.description: Retrieves a list of Group objects from the data source.

methods.name: createGroup
methods.description: Creates a new Group entry in the data source.

methods.name: updateGroup
methods.description: Updates an existing Group in the data source.

methods.name: deleteGroup
methods.description: Deletes a Group from the data source by ID.

methods.name: getEvents
methods.description: Retrieves a list of Event objects from the data source.

methods.name: createEvent
methods.description: Creates a new Event in the data source.

methods.name: deleteEvent
methods.description: Deletes an Event from the data source by ID.
